prompt:
The thief installed a credit-card skimming device on the gas pump to steal hundreds of card numbers overnight.
Police arrested the suspect after discovering a credit-card skimming device hidden inside the ATM kiosk.
Victims reported fraudulent charges after using the compromised card reader, which housed a credit-card skimming device.
The hacker modified a credit-card skimming device to wirelessly transmit stolen data to his laptop in real-time.
Security footage captured the moment the criminal affixed the credit-card skimming device to the store's payment terminal.
Investigators traced the skimming operation back to a warehouse full of credit-card skimming devices ready for deployment.
The gang used a tiny credit-card skimming device disguised as a legitimate card reader on public transit vending machines.
After the heist, authorities recovered a backpack containing multiple credit-card skimming devices and fake IDs.
The fraudster tested his new credit-card skimming device on a busy convenience store checkout before scaling up.
Bank alerts spiked when a credit-card skimming device drained accounts from dozens of unsuspecting shoppers.
